entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v1.2.0 - Set custom background images
entry.content:
Added

  • Using the new VIKUNJA_BACKGROUND_IMG_URL and LINKWARDEN_BACKGROUND_IMG_URL environment variables, it's now possible to set custom background images for the tasks/bookmarks cards of the Vikunja and Linkwarden iframes.
  • The background_position, background_size, and background_filter query arguments added to the Vikunja and Linkwarden iframes can change the custom background images' CSS properties.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v1.1.1...v1.2.0

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v1.4.0 - Speedtest tracker alarm
entry.content:
Breaking Changes

Start using the speedtest tracker v1 API (as the previous API is deprecated). Because of this, the speedtest tracker alarm now needs an API token to work. You can get it in your speedtest tracker dashboard and provide using the environment variable SPEEDTEST_TRACKER_TOKEN.

Added

The alarms iframe now shows if the latest speedtest tracker test threshold breached in addition to showing if an error occurred in the latest test:

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v1.3.0...v1.4.0

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v1.5.0 - Add ChangeDetection.io to Alarms iFrame
entry.content:
ChangeDetection.io

Shows cards for your watches' errors and changes from your ChangeDetection.io instance. - Check the docs for more info.

Docker Image

  1. Reduce docker image size from 1.3GB to 43MB.
  2. Add health check.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v1.4.0...v1.5.0

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v1.5.5
entry.content:
Changes since v1.5.3.

Added

  • Query argument changedetectionio_show_viewed to the alarms' iframe. If its value is false, don't show ChangeDetection.io viewed change cards in the iframe. Defaults to true.

Changed

  • Media releases iframe query argument radarrReleaseType now also accepts multiple release types separated by commas, like inCinemas, inCinemas,digital, physical,digital. Default value is inCinemas,physical,digital.
  • Media releases iframe considers that a movie should be downloaded or not using the digital release date if available, instead of using the value of the query argument radarrReleaseType, as it was before.
  • Media releases iframe tags "Available" and "Not Available" were changed to "Downloaded" and "Not Downloaded", respectively:

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v1.5.3...v1.5.5

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v1.12.0: Regex filter for alarms iframe
entry.content:
Regex filter for alarms iframe

You can add a regex filter to the alarms iframe, it'll match the regex with the concatenated attributes of each alarm using the style source summary URL status property value, but without the spaces.

Example: "NetdataSystem requires reboot after package updateshttps://netdata.domain.comWARNINGOS / System1 status" for the alarm below:

  • The regex is provided using the environment variable ALARMS_REGEX.
  • The alarms iframe query argument regex_include can have the values true or false (true by default). If true shows only alarms that match the regex. If false only alarms that don't match the regex.

Brazil Cinemark iframe

It shows the movie cover in the cards background instead of that static popcorn image.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v1.11.0...v1.12.0
